mapper.select: SELECT beach_number, ST_Y(location::geometry) AS lat, ST_X(location::geometry) AS lon FROM tb_beach
mapper.insert:
insert into tb_weather_info (temperature, humidity, rain_probability, rain, wind_gusts, wind_speed, wind_direction, uv_index, uv_index_clear_sky, forecast_time, observed_location) values
( #{it.temperature}, #{it.humidity}, #{it.rainProbability}, #{it.rain}, #{it.windGusts}, #{it.windSpeed}, #{it.windDirection}, #{it.uvIndex}, #{it.uvIndexClearSky}, #{it.forecastTime}, ST_SetSRID(ST_MakePoint(#{it.lon}, #{it.lat}), 4326) )
ON CONFLICT ((ST_Y(observed_location::geometry)), (ST_X(observed_location::geometry)), forecast_time) DO UPDATE SET
temperature = EXCLUDED.temperature, humidity = EXCLUDED.humidity, rain_probability = EXCLUDED.rain_probability, rain = EXCLUDED.rain, wind_gusts = EXCLUDED.wind_gusts, wind_speed = EXCLUDED.wind_speed, wind_direction = EXCLUDED.wind_direction, uv_index = EXCLUDED.uv_index, uv_index_clear_sky = EXCLUDED.uv_index_clear_sky, observed_location = EXCLUDED.observed_location
